Sentencas: Lanthanum strontium manganite is a classic cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Flame spray synthesis of nano lanthanum strontium manganite for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Nanosized LSM particles, due to their higher specfic surface area, have been found to enhance the electrode performance by providing a larger three phase boundary (TPB) area.
Titulo: Flame spray synthesis of nano lanthanum strontium manganite for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: However conventional processes like solid state, sol-gel or co-precipitation, produce particles having low specic surface area (< 8 m(2)/g) and hence require high sintering temperatures.
Titulo: Flame spray synthesis of nano lanthanum strontium manganite for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Moreover these processes are multi-step and are hence time consuming.
Titulo: Flame spray synthesis of nano lanthanum strontium manganite for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: In the present work, single phase LSM with a crystallite size of 26 nm and a specfic surface area as high as 40 m(2)/g was produced by a flame spray pyrolysis method.
Titulo: Flame spray synthesis of nano lanthanum strontium manganite for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The as-synthesized powder was characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD), nitrogen adsorption, scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and transmission electron microscopy (TEM).
Titulo: Flame spray synthesis of nano lanthanum strontium manganite for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Porous thin films were prepared by spin coating a water based dispersion of LSM.
Titulo: Flame spray synthesis of nano lanthanum strontium manganite for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Electrochemical performance of the nanoparticulate cathode films were studied using impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Flame spray synthesis of nano lanthanum strontium manganite for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Interfacial polarization resistance value of as low as 0.085 Omega cm (2) at 850 degrees C was obtained by this method.
Titulo: Flame spray synthesis of nano lanthanum strontium manganite for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: This method thus offers a very cost effective approach for the preparation of highly active cathode thin films for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Flame spray synthesis of nano lanthanum strontium manganite for solid oxide fuel cell applications
